intro: Become a chess master and practice the best moves. Basic guide for all those who want to start or improve their skills.
description:
Learn the best chess moves and efficient chess strategies to impress all your opponents.

A fun performance guide to become a chess master.

You will find:
- 26 different openings
- 84 variations / continuations

And to make the experience more fun, we have board images and move lists for each move. 

Do you accept the challenge?
